configs.additionalSettings: {"about":"Freeze and hide apps rarely used, they won't be able to steal your battery or cellular data in background.","appName":"Ice Box","customLinkFilterRegex":"^https\\:\\/\\/dl\\.coolapk\\.com\\/down\\?pn\\=com\\.catchingnow\\.icebox(?:[&#].*)?$","filterByLinkText":false,"reverseSort":true,"skipSort":true,"trackOnly":true,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"versionDetection":false,"versionExtractWholePage":true,"versionExtractionRegEx":"(?<=\\<span(?:\\s|(?:\\\\n))+class\\=\"list_app_info\"\\>(?:\\s|(?:\\\\n))+)(?!\\\\n)[^<\\s](?:[^<]*[^<\\s])?(?<!\\\\n)(?=(?:\\s|(?:\\\\n))*\\<\\/span\\>)"}

description.en: Freeze and hide apps rarely used, they won't be able to steal your battery or cellular data in background.
description.zh: 将不常用的应用统统冻起来，防止后台运行，有效的防止它们在后台偷电偷流量。
